name: Whitespine (Deflect 1)

features.Enhanced Senses: The whitespine gains an advantage on non-attack tests that rely on smell.
features.Spined Carapace: After an enemy within 5ft of the whitespane grazes them with a weapon attack, the enemy takes 3 (1d6) keen damage.

action.name: Strike: Claws
action.description: Attack +5, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 3 (1d6) keen damage. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) keen damage, and the whitespane can spend 1 focus to make the target Afflicted [1d4 vital] until the target regains at least 1 health.

action.name: Goring Claws
action.description: Attack +5, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 4 (1d8) impact damage. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) impact damage. If the whitespine hits with this attack after moving 15ft, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) impact damage and must succeed on a DC12 Athletics or be knocked Prone.

bi_action.name: Pheromone Release
bi_action.description: The whitespine releases foul pheromones. Each non-whitespine character within 10 ft of them must succeed on a DC13 Discipline or become stunned until the end of the Whitespine's next turned.

tactics: Prefer to charge at distant, weak opponents to Goring Claws them. Will charge rather than stay attacking. When fighting goes poorly will use Pheromones to retreat or overwhelm.
